comments: A011784 allows the addition of a(-1)=0 and a(0)=2 using row A012257(-2)=1 and A012257(-1)=0 resp. row A012257(0)=2. In this sense A011784 / A012257 are "generated" by (1,0), A061892 / A061893 by (1,0,0), A061894 / A061895 by (2,0).
prog: (REXX) /* replace 1 0 0 by 1 0 to get A011784 */S = ''; A = 1 0 0; do N = 1 to 10; T = words( A );S = S word( A, T ); B = A; A = ''; do K = 1 to T;A = A space( copies( K '', word( B, T + 1 - K )));end K; end N; T = words( A ); say S word( A, T ) T;
author: _Frank Ellermann_, May 13 2001
extensions: One more term from _Naohiro Nomoto_, May 10 2002
